author: ShebasDad
title: Everything felt and looked new - Except the mattress.
text:
Stayed here for a long weekend in November. The hotel was exquisite, immaculate and wonderfully restored. I found the staff to be extremely nice, helpful and accommodating.
The only reason for 2 stars instead of 4 or 5 stars is the MATTRESS. We stayed in room that was brand new, recently opened. The mattress was the worst mattress I have ever slept on in my entire life. My wife and I would wake up each morning with a terrible backache. Just to give you some context, I am a 45 year old male with a VERY healthy back, never have I had a bad back in my life. I complained to the front desk but was informed the room was new and the mattresses were a signature item provided to all Thompson hotels. Result - I will never stay at a Thompson Hotel again. Amazing how one mattress can ruin your entire weekend.
